short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a graph to monitor the production in your companies. Helps in making decisions regarding salary and job offers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that adds a graph with three variables to monitor the production in your companies. Helps the entrepreneur in making decisions regarding salary and job offers.

You can also easily download the data in JSON
